This article is a PNAS Direct Submission.
Data deposition: The simulation data analyzed in this manuscript are available through the National Snow and Ice Data Center (doi: 10.5067/ZRL5WJKN01XM).
This article contains supporting information online at www.pnas.org/lookup/suppl/doi:10.1073/pnas.1719903115/-/DCSupplemental.
